name: Integrys AssetPoint
overview:
Integrys AssetPoint LLC provides integrated maintenance software and program improvement services for the process, manufacturing, and facilities industries. It offers TabWare EFX, an enterprise asset management and computerized maintenance management system that helps businesses to maintain capital-intensive assets, monitor overall performance, and optimize equipment, inventory, procurement, and personnel resources. The companyâ€™s TabWare modules include equipment, work order, preventive maintenance, inventory, event tracking, scheduling, resource, requisition, purchasing, multiple warehousing, invoice matching, setup, and security. It offers its TabWare solution as a hosted solution through Web, as well as in a client/server or Internet ASP environment. The company also provides TabWare Analytics that offers dashboard/scorecard capability with drill-down features, which enables management to spot areas of concern and get down to details; TabWare integration, a business integration solution; TabWare Web Work Request System, a browser based work request system; EZBid that streamlines the process of obtaining competitive pricing and issuing purchase orders; TabLink, which provides an automatic link to supplier e-catalogs over the Internet; and TabAnyWare that offers mobile maintenance and mobile inventory. In addition, it offers reliability solutions, including maintenance reliability and work process consulting, maintenance technology, maintenance support, and training services, as well as implementation and technical services. The company provides its solutions to various industries, such as mining, chemical, medical/biotech, metals, manufacturing, food/beverage, timber/wood products, facilities, refining, and amusement/theme parks.

Integrys AssetPoint LLC was founded as Tabware, Inc. in 2002 and changed its name to Integrys AssetPoint LLC in April 2002 following the acquisition by Integrys Holdings LLC. The company is based in Greenville, South Carolina.
